00018 /**
00019  * \brief The CSettings class handles the saving and loading of all the settings that are saved in
00020  *    the game. Those are, video, audio, options and input.
00021  *
00022  * \param p_option pointer to an array that stores the options settings of the game
00023  */
00024 CSettings::CSettings(stOption *p_option) {
00025  notes << "Reading game options from " << GetFullFileName(CONFIGFILENAME) << endl;
00026  notes << "Will write game options to " << GetWriteFullFileName(CONFIGFILENAME, true) << endl;
00027  mp_option = p_option;
00028 }
00029 
00030 /**
00031  * \brief Write the whole configuration of the settings.
00032  *    Note: See also CConfiguration to understand better the concept of saving...
00033  *
00034  * \return If the configuration has been saved successfully, it return true, else it's false.
00035  */
00036 bool CSettings::saveDrvCfg()
00037 {
00038  CConfiguration Configuration(CONFIGFILENAME);
00039  Configuration.Parse();
00040  
00041  int i = 1;
00042  for(searchpathlist::const_iterator p = tSearchPaths.begin(); p != tSearchPaths.end(); p++, i++)
00043   Configuration.WriteString("FileHandling", "SearchPath" + itoa(i), *p);
00044  
00045  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "bpp",g_pVideoDriver->getDepth());
00046  Configuration.SetKeyword("Video", "fullscreen", g_pVideoDriver->getFullscreen());
00047  Configuration.SetKeyword("Video", "OpenGL", g_pVideoDriver->isOpenGL());
00048 
00049  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "width", g_pVideoDriver->getWidth());
00050  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "height", g_pVideoDriver->getHeight());
00051  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "scale", g_pVideoDriver->getZoomValue());
00052  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "OGLfilter", g_pVideoDriver->getOGLFilter());
00053  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "filter", g_pVideoDriver->getFiltermode());
00054  Configuration.SetKeyword("Video", "specialfx", g_pVideoDriver->getSpecialFXConfig());
00055  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "autoframeskip", g_pTimer->getFrameRate());
00056  Configuration.WriteInt("Video", "showfps", g_pVideoDriver->showfps);
00057  
00058  st_camera_bounds &CameraBounds = g_pVideoDriver->getCameraBounds();
00059  Configuration.WriteInt("Bound", "left", CameraBounds.left);
00060  Configuration.WriteInt("Bound", "right", CameraBounds.right);
00061  Configuration.WriteInt("Bound", "up", CameraBounds.up);
00062  Configuration.WriteInt("Bound", "down", CameraBounds.down);
00063  Configuration.WriteInt("Bound", "speed", CameraBounds.speed);
00064  
00065  Configuration.WriteInt("Audio", "channels", (g_pSound->getAudioSpec()).channels);
00066  Configuration.WriteInt("Audio", "format", (g_pSound->getAudioSpec()).format);
00067  Configuration.WriteInt("Audio", "rate", (g_pSound->getAudioSpec()).freq);
00068  Configuration.WriteInt("Audio", "mixerch", (g_pSound->getMixingchannels()));
00069  Configuration.WriteInt("Audio", "musicvol", (g_pSound->getMusicVolume()/8));
00070  Configuration.WriteInt("Audio", "soundvol", (g_pSound->getSoundVolume()/8));
00071  
00072  return Configuration.saveCfgFile();
00073 }
00074 
00075 /**
00076  * \brief It loads the whole configuration from the settings file.
00077  *    NOTE: Also take a look at CConfiguration.
00078  *
00079  * \return  true if successful, false if not.
00080  */
00081 bool CSettings::loadDrvCfg()
00082 {
00083  CConfiguration Configuration(CONFIGFILENAME);
00084  
00085  if(!Configuration.Parse()) return false;
00086  else
00087  {
00088   int width, height, depth;
00089   Configuration.ReadInteger("Video", "bpp", &depth, 32);
00090   Configuration.ReadInteger("Video", "width", &width, 320);
00091   Configuration.ReadInteger("Video", "height", &height, 200);
00092   
00093   if(depth*width*height <= 0)
00094   {
00095    g_pLogFile->ftextOut(RED,"Error reading the configuration file!<br>");
00096    return false;
00097   }
00098   else
00099    g_pVideoDriver->setMode(width,height,depth);
00100 
00101   bool fullscreen;
00102   Configuration.ReadKeyword("Video", "fullscreen", &fullscreen, false);
00103   g_pVideoDriver->isFullscreen(fullscreen);
00104   
00105   bool glfilter;
00106   Configuration.ReadKeyword("Video", "OGLfilter", &glfilter, false);
00107   g_pVideoDriver->setOGLFilter(glfilter);
00108 
00109   int scale;
00110   Configuration.ReadInteger("Video", "scale", &scale, 1);
00111   g_pVideoDriver->setZoom(scale);
00112 
00113   bool special_fx;
00114   Configuration.ReadKeyword("Video", "specialfx", &special_fx, true);
00115   g_pVideoDriver->setSpecialFXMode(special_fx);
00116 
00117   Configuration.ReadKeyword("Video", "showfps", &g_pVideoDriver->showfps, false);
00118 
00119   int framerate;
00120   Configuration.ReadInteger("Video", "autoframeskip", &framerate, 60);
00121   g_pTimer->setFrameRate(DEFAULT_LPS, framerate, DEFAULT_SYNC);
00122 
00123   st_camera_bounds CameraBounds;
00124   Configuration.ReadInteger("Bound", "left", &CameraBounds.left, 152);
00125   Configuration.ReadInteger("Bound", "right", &CameraBounds.right, 168);
00126   Configuration.ReadInteger("Bound", "up", &CameraBounds.up, 92);
00127   Configuration.ReadInteger("Bound", "down", &CameraBounds.down, 108);
00128   Configuration.ReadInteger("Bound", "speed", &CameraBounds.speed, 20);
00129 
00130   g_pVideoDriver->saveCameraBounds(CameraBounds);
00131   
00132   int filter;
00133   Configuration.ReadInteger("Video", "filter", &filter, 1);
00134   g_pVideoDriver->setFilter(filter);
00135   
00136   bool opengl;
00137   Configuration.ReadKeyword("Video", "OpenGL", &opengl, false);
00138   g_pVideoDriver->enableOpenGL(opengl);
00139 
00140   int audio_rate, audio_channels, audio_format;
00141   Configuration.ReadInteger("Audio", "rate", &audio_rate, 44000);
00142   Configuration.ReadInteger("Audio", "channels", &audio_channels, 2);
00143   Configuration.ReadInteger("Audio", "format", &audio_format, AUDIO_U8);
00144   g_pSound->setSoundmode(audio_rate, audio_channels, audio_format);
00145 
00146   int sound_vol, music_vol;
00147   Configuration.ReadInteger("Audio", "musicvol", &music_vol, SDL_MIX_MAXVOLUME);
00148   Configuration.ReadInteger("Audio", "soundvol", &sound_vol, SDL_MIX_MAXVOLUME);
00149 
00150   g_pSound->setMusicVolume(music_vol*8);
00151   g_pSound->setSoundVolume(sound_vol*8);
00152  }
00153  return true;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void CSettings::loadDefaultGraphicsCfg() //Loads default graphics
00157 {
00158  g_pVideoDriver->setMode(320,200,32);
00159  g_pVideoDriver->isFullscreen(false);
00160  g_pVideoDriver->setOGLFilter(false);
00161  g_pVideoDriver->setZoom(1);
00162  g_pTimer->setFrameRate(DEFAULT_LPS, 60, DEFAULT_SYNC);
00163  g_pVideoDriver->setFilter(1);
00164  g_pVideoDriver->enableOpenGL(false);
00165 }

00167 /**
00168  * \brief checks if the pointer to the options array is set.
00169  *
00170  * \return   true, if pointer is properly set, false if not.
00171  */
00172 bool CSettings::checkOptionPtr() {
00173  if(mp_option) return true;
00174  g_pLogFile->textOut("ERROR in Code implementation! There is an error in the source code. Pointer mp_option cannot be used here!\n");
00175  return false;
00176 }
00177 
00178 /**
00179  * \brief Sets the option data to the option array.
00180  *
00181  * \param opt   option ID
00182  * \param menuname Name of the option shown in the options menu
00183  *       NOTE: This name may change, depending on what value is set
00184  * \param name  Name of the option itself
00185  *       NOTE: This string should be changed, since it names the topic
00186  *       of the applied option
00187  * \param value  Value that has to be set.
00188  */
00189 void CSettings::setOption( e_OptionKeyword opt, const std::string &menuname, const std::string &name, char value)
00190 {
00191  if(!checkOptionPtr()) return;
00192  mp_option[opt].menuname = menuname;
00193  mp_option[opt].name = name;
00194  mp_option[opt].value = value;
00195 }
00196 /**
00197  * \brief  This is normally processed when the game is started. It sets the default options.
00198  */
00199 void CSettings::loadDefaultGameCfg()
00200 {
00201  if(!checkOptionPtr()) return;
00202  setOption( OPT_FULLYAUTOMATIC, "Machine Gun      ", "autogun", 0 );
00203  setOption( OPT_SUPERPOGO,  "Super Pogo Stick ", "superpogo", 0 );
00204  setOption( OPT_ALLOWPKING,  "Friendly Fire    ", "pking", 1 );
00205  setOption( OPT_KEYSTACK,  "Keystacking      ", "keystack", 0 );
00206  setOption( OPT_ANALOGJOYSTICK, "Analog Joystick  ", "analog_joystick", 1 );
00207  setOption( OPT_LVLREPLAYABILITY,"Replay Levels    ", "level_replayability", 0 );
00208  setOption( OPT_RISEBONUS,  "Rising Bonus     ", "rise_bonus", 1 );
00209  setOption( OPT_SWITCHSCORES, "Score Fix (EP3)  ", "switch_scores", 0 );
00210  setOption( OPT_IMPPOGO,   "Impossible Pogo  ", "impossible_pogo", 0 );
00211  setOption( OPT_HUD,    "HUD Display      ", "hud", 1 );
00212  setOption( OPT_FLASHEFFECT,  "Flash Effects    ", "flashfx", 1 );
00213 }
00214 
00215 /**
00216  * \brief  This loads the options of the settings
00217  *
00218  * \return   true if options could be loaded, else false
00219  */
00220 bool CSettings::loadGameCfg()
00221 {
00222  int i;
00223  CConfiguration Configuration(CONFIGFILENAME);
00224 
00225  if(!Configuration.Parse()) return false;
00226 
00227  if(!checkOptionPtr()) return false;
00228 
00229  loadDefaultGameCfg();
00230 
00231  for (i = 0; i < NUM_OPTIONS; i++)
00232  {
00233   bool newvalue;
00234   Configuration.ReadKeyword("Game", mp_option[i].name, &newvalue, false);
00235   mp_option[i].value = (newvalue) ? 1 : 0;
00236  }
00237  
00238  g_pLogFile->ftextOut("<br>Your personal settings were loaded successfully...<br>");
00239  return true;
00240 }
00241 
00242 /**
00243  * \brief  Saves the options in the settings
00244  */
00245 bool CSettings::saveGameCfg()
00246 {
00247  CConfiguration Configuration(CONFIGFILENAME);
00248 
00249  if(!Configuration.Parse()) return false;
00250  
00251  if(!checkOptionPtr()) return false;
00252 
00253  for (int i = 0; i < NUM_OPTIONS; i++)
00254   Configuration.SetKeyword("Game", mp_option[i].name, mp_option[i].value);
00255  
00256  Configuration.saveCfgFile();
00257  return true;
00258 }
